Kiya is a Systems Analyst on the Imaging Applications team. At JAX, she develops, deploys, and maintains containerized OMERO instances for imaging data management and public data hosting. She has a background in academic IT software development, computational single-cell next-generation sequencing research in cancer and neurobiology, and dance instruction.
